<WG1473> But I 1161 CONJ Brethren, 80 N-VPM If 1487 COND Circumcision 4061 N-ASF Yet 2089 ADV I Proclaim, 2784 V-PAI-1S Why 5101 I-ASN Yet 2089 ADV Am I Persecuted? 1377 V-PPI-1S Then 686 PRT Has Been Done Away 2673 V-RPI-3S The 3588 T-NSN Offense 4625 N-NSN Of The 3588 T-GSM Cross. 4716 N-GSM
I Would <WG3785> Even <WG2532> They Would Cut Themselves Off <WG609> Who <WG3588> Throw Into Confusion <WG387> You. <WG5209>

<WG5210> For Ye <WG1063> ' For <WG1909> Freedom <WG1657> Were Called, <WG2564> Brethren; <WG80> Only <WG3440> Use Not <WG3361> The <WG3588> Freedom <WG1657> For <WG1519> An Occasion <WG874> To The <WG3588> Flesh, <WG4561> But <WG235> By <WG1223> <WG3588> Love <WG26> Serve Ye <WG1398> One Another. <WG240>

<WG1487> But If <WG1161> One Another <WG240> Ye Bite <WG1143> And <WG2532> Devour, <WG2719> Take Heed <WG991> Not <WG3361> By <WG5259> One Another <WG240> Ye Be Consumed. <WG355>
<WG3004> But I Say, <WG1161> By The Spirit <WG4151> Walk Ye, <WG4043> And <WG2532> Desire <WG1939> Flesh's <WG4561> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> Should Ye Fulfil. <WG5055>

<WG3588> For The <WG1063> Flesh <WG4561> Desires <WG1937> Against <WG2596> The <WG3588> Spirit, <WG4151> <WG3588> And The <WG1161> Spirit <WG4151> Against <WG2596> The <WG3588> Flesh; <WG4561> These Things <WG5023> And <WG1161> Are Opposed <WG480> To One Another, <WG240> That <WG2443> Not <WG3361> <WG3739> Whatsoever <WG302> Ye May Wish <WG2309> Those Things <WG5023> Ye Should Do; <WG4160>

Envyings, <WG5355>, Murders, <WG5408> Drunkennesses, <WG3178> Revels, <WG2970> And <WG2532> Things <WG3588> Like <WG3664> These; <WG5125> As To Which <WG3739> I Tell Beforehand <WG4302> You, <WG5213> Even As <WG2531> Also <WG2532> I Said Before, <WG4277> That <WG3754> They Who <WG3588> <WG3588> Such Things <WG5108> Do <WG4238> Kingdom <WG932> God's <WG2316> <WG3756> Shall Not Inherit. <WG2816>
